title: Lieb-Schultz-Mattis constraints from stratified anomalies of modulated symmetries
summary: We introduce stratified symmetry operators and stratified anomalies in quantum lattice systems as generalizations of onsite symmetry operators and onsite projective representations. A stratified symmetry operator is a symmetry operator that factorizes into mutually independent subsystem symmetry operators; its stratified anomaly is defined as the collection of anomalies associated with these subsystem operators. We develop a cellular chain complex formalism for stratified anomalies of internal symmetries and show that, in the presence of crystalline symmetries, they give rise to Lieb-Schultz-Mattis (LSM) constraints. This includes LSM anomalies and SPT-LSM theorems. We apply this framework to modulated $G$ symmetries, which are symmetries whose total symmetry group is ${G_\mathrm{tot} = G \rtimes G_\mathrm{s}}$, with $G_\mathrm{s}$ the crystalline symmetry group. Notably, a nonzero stratified anomaly within a fundamental domain of $G_\mathrm{s}$ (e.g., a unit cell) does not always imply an LSM anomaly for modulated symmetries. Instead, the existence of an LSM anomaly also depends on how $G_\mathrm{s}$ acts on $G$. When $G_\mathrm{s}$ is the lattice translation group, we find an explicit criterion for when a stratified anomaly causes an LSM anomaly, and classify LSM anomalies using homology groups of $G_\mathrm{s}$-invariant cellular chains. We illustrate this through examples of exponential and dipole symmetries with stratified anomalies, both in ${(1+1)}$D and ${(2+1)}$D, and construct a stabilizer code model of a modulated SPT subject to an SPT-LSM theorem.

AI.tldr: 该论文引入分层对称性算符和分层异常作为量子晶格系统中局域对称性算符和局域投影表示的一般化，建立了分层异常的细胞链复形形式，并展示了在晶体对称性存在时如何产生Lieb-Schultz-Mattis约束。
AI.motivation: 传统上研究量子晶格系统的对称性异常主要关注局域对称性，但许多物理系统具有分层或子系统对称性结构。需要发展一个统一框架来处理这类分层对称性及其异常，特别是在晶体对称性存在时如何产生LSM约束。
AI.method: 引入分层对称性算符（分解为相互独立的子系统对称性算符）和分层异常概念，开发细胞链复形形式来描述内部对称性的分层异常。特别关注调制G对称性（总对称群为G⋊Gs），分析Gs作用对LSM异常的影响。
AI.result: 建立了分层异常的数学框架，发现对于调制对称性，基本域内的非零分层异常不一定导致LSM异常，这还取决于Gs如何作用在G上。当Gs为晶格平移群时，给出了分层异常导致LSM异常的明确判据，并用Gs不变细胞链的同调群对LSM异常进行分类。
AI.conclusion: 分层异常框架为理解量子晶格系统中对称性异常提供了统一视角，揭示了晶体对称性作用对LSM约束的关键影响，并通过指数对称性和偶极对称性等具体例子展示了该理论的应用价值。

title: Initialization with a Fock State Cavity Mode in Real-Time Nuclear--Electronic Orbital Polariton Dynamics
summary: Molecular polaritons have drawn great interest in recent years as a possible avenue for providing optical control over chemical dynamics. A central challenge in the field is to identify physical phenomena that require a quantum rather than a classical treatment of electrodynamics. In this work, we use our recently developed mean-field quantum (mfq) and full-quantum (fq) real-time nuclear--electronic orbital (RT-NEO) time-dependent density functional theory methods to simulate polaritonic dynamics for a molecule under vibrational strong coupling when a quantized cavity mode is initialized in a Fock state rather than a coherent state. Our previous work showed that a coherent state initial condition for the cavity mode leads to polariton formation for both the mfq-RT-NEO and fq-RT-NEO methods. Herein, we show that the mfq-RT-NEO method, which does not allow light--matter entanglement, does not predict polariton formation for a Fock state initial condition. Similar to the mfq-RT-NEO method, the fq-RT-NEO method does not predict oscillations of the cavity mode coordinate and molecular dipole operator expectation values for a Fock state initial condition. However, the fq-RT-NEO method does predict oscillations of the expectation values of even powers of these operators as well as light--matter entanglement, implicating polariton formation with a Fock state initial condition. All these observations can be explained with model systems. These results suggest that using a quantized cavity mode initial condition that does not have a direct analogy to an initial condition in classical electrodynamics can lead to physical phenomena that can only be described by a quantum treatment of the cavity mode.

AI.tldr: 该研究使用量子-经典混合方法比较了不同初始条件下分子极化激元的形成，发现Fock态初始条件能揭示仅量子电动力学才能描述的物理现象。
AI.motivation: 分子极化激元领域需要区分哪些物理现象必须用量子电动力学而非经典电动力学来描述。研究旨在探索当腔模初始化为Fock态（而非相干态）时，量子处理是否对描述极化激元动力学至关重要。
AI.method: 使用作者团队开发的两种方法：平均场量子(mfq)-RT-NEO和全量子(fq)-RT-NEO实时核-电子轨道时变密度泛函理论方法，模拟振动强耦合下分子的极化激元动力学。比较腔模初始化为Fock态和相干态时的不同行为。
AI.result: 对于Fock态初始条件：1) mfq-RT-NEO方法（不允许光-物质纠缠）无法预测极化激元形成；2) fq-RT-NEO方法虽然不预测腔模坐标和分子偶极算符期望值的振荡，但预测这些算符偶次幂期望值的振荡以及光-物质纠缠，表明极化激元形成；3) 这些观察结果可通过模型系统解释。
AI.conclusion: 使用在经典电动力学中没有直接类比的量子腔模初始条件（如Fock态）能够产生仅能用量子电动力学描述的物理现象，这为区分量子与经典处理提供了重要依据。

title: Stochastic Point Kinetics Model of Circulating-Fuel Reactors under Perfect Mixing Approximation
comment: 9 pages, 3 figures, author's original manuscript of a paper accepted for presentation at the Physor 2026 conference
summary: We present a stochastic framework for low-population dynamics in circulating-fuel reactors (CFRs) that captures delayed-neutron precursor (DNP) transport without delay terms. Starting from a modified point-kinetics model with two perfectly-mixed volumes, we derive equivalent discrete-event dynamics and an Itô stochastic differential equation (SDE) system. Two solvers are implemented: an analog Monte Carlo (AMC) engine and a semi-implicit Milstein SDE solver. Transient benchmarks demonstrate perfect agreement of AMC/SDE means with deterministic solutions, while revealing that the SDE approach underestimates DNP variances in selected regimes, potentially due to the neglect of DNP noise. We further recast reactivity loss due to precursor drift in this stochastic setting and show that its estimator is negatively biased. Overall, the developed framework provides a minimal yet representative model for CFR low-population kinetics. Future work will re-derive and test SDE noise terms and apply the framework to selected transient applications such as start-up analyses of CFRs.

AI.tldr: 提出一个随机框架用于循环燃料反应堆的低种群动力学，无需延迟项即可捕获延迟中子先驱核输运，包含蒙特卡洛和SDE两种求解器，发现SDE方法在某些情况下低估方差。
AI.motivation: 为循环燃料反应堆（CFR）的低种群动力学开发一个随机框架，能够捕获延迟中子先驱核（DNP）的输运效应，而无需使用传统的延迟项，从而更准确地模拟反应堆动力学。
AI.method: 从改进的两体积完美混合点动力学模型出发，推导出等效的离散事件动力学和伊藤随机微分方程系统，实现了两种求解器：模拟蒙特卡洛引擎和半隐式Milstein SDE求解器。
AI.result: 瞬态基准测试显示AMC/SDE均值与确定性解完全一致，但SDE方法在特定工况下低估了DNP方差，可能是由于忽略了DNP噪声；同时发现先驱核漂移导致的反应性损失估计器存在负偏差。
AI.conclusion: 该框架为CFR低种群动力学提供了一个最小但具有代表性的模型，未来工作将重新推导和测试SDE噪声项，并将框架应用于CFR启动分析等瞬态应用。

title: Renormalization group analysis of directed percolation process: Towards multiloop calculation of scaling functions
comment: accepted for publication in Theoretical and Mathematical Physics
summary: In this work, we employ a field-theoretic renormalization group approach to study a paradigmatic model of directed percolation. We focus on the perturbative calculation of the equation of state, extending the analysis to the three-loop order in the expansion parameter $\varepsilon = 4-d$. We show that a large group of the necessary three-loop Feynman diagrams can be mapped onto already existing three-loop results, and develop a technique for the calculation of the remaining -- truly novel -- ones. The described semi-analytic procedure is further used to verify existing two-loop results. The main aim of this study is to provide an update on this ongoing work, as full three-loop calculations utilizing the described procedure are in progress.

AI.tldr: 使用场论重整化群方法研究定向渗流模型，将状态方程计算扩展到三圈阶，开发了处理新费曼图的技术，并验证了现有二圈结果
AI.motivation: 研究定向渗流这一典型模型，将状态方程的计算扩展到更高阶（三圈），以提供更精确的理论预测，同时开发处理复杂费曼图的技术
AI.method: 采用场论重整化群方法，使用ε=4-d展开参数进行微扰计算，将大部分三圈费曼图映射到现有结果，并开发新技术处理剩余的新图，采用半解析程序
AI.result: 成功验证了现有的二圈结果，开发了处理三圈费曼图的技术，完整的三圈计算正在进行中
AI.conclusion: 这项工作为定向渗流模型提供了更精确的状态方程计算方法，开发的技术可用于处理复杂的高阶微扰计算，为后续研究奠定了基础

title: Vibrational Quantum-State-Controlled Reactivity in the O2+ + C3H4 Reaction
summary: Quantum-state-controlled reactivity is a long-standing goal in the field of physical chemistry. In this work, we explore the vibrational-state-dependent behavior of the ion-molecule reaction between O2+ in distinct vibrational states and two isomers of C3H4, allene (H2C3H2) and propyne (H3C3H). While most products are formed regardless of the vibrational state of O2+, the branching ratios are influenced by vibrational excitation, and a new product, C2O+, appears exclusively in the excited-state reactions. This selective formation of C2O+ demonstrates that vibrational excitation can effectively activate a reaction pathway, providing direct evidence of quantum-state control in reactivity. These results represent an important step towards the goal of quantum-state-controlled chemistry in molecular systems.

AI.tldr: 该研究展示了O2+离子与C3H4异构体反应中振动激发态对反应路径的量子态控制，特别是C2O+产物仅在激发态反应中出现
AI.motivation: 实现量子态控制的化学反应是物理化学领域的长期目标，本研究旨在探索振动激发态如何影响离子-分子反应的路径选择性
AI.method: 研究O2+在不同振动态下与C3H4的两种异构体（丙二烯和丙炔）的离子-分子反应，分析振动激发对反应产物和分支比的影响
AI.result: 虽然大多数产物在不同振动态下都能形成，但分支比受振动激发影响，特别是C2O+产物仅在O2+激发态反应中出现，表明振动激发能有效激活特定反应路径
AI.conclusion: 振动激发可以实现对反应路径的量子态控制，这为分子系统中量子态控制化学的目标迈出了重要一步

title: Addressing the ground state of the deuteron by physics-informed neural networks
summary: Machine learning techniques have proven to be effective in addressing the structure of atomic nuclei. Physics$-$Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) are a promising machine learning technique suitable for solving integro-differential problems such as the many-body Schrödinger problem. So far, there has been no demonstration of extracting nuclear eigenstates using such method. Here, we tackle realistic nucleon-nucleon interaction in momentum space, including models with strong high-momentum correlations, and demonstrate highly accurate results for the deuteron. We further provide additional benchmarks in coordinate space. We introduce an expression for the variational energy that enters the loss function, which can be evaluated efficiently within the PINNs framework. Results are in excellent agreement with proven numerical methods, with a relative error between the value of the predicted binding energy by the PINN and the numerical benchmark of the order of $10^{-6}$. Our approach paves the way for the exploitation of PINNs to solve more complex atomic nuclei.

AI.tldr: 使用物理信息神经网络（PINNs）成功求解了氘核的薛定谔方程，首次展示了该方法在提取核本征态方面的应用，预测结合能的相对误差达到10^-6量级。
AI.motivation: 虽然物理信息神经网络（PINNs）已被证明适用于解决积分-微分问题，如多体薛定谔问题，但此前尚未有研究展示如何使用该方法提取原子核的本征态。本研究旨在填补这一空白。
AI.method: 采用物理信息神经网络（PINNs）框架，处理动量空间中的实际核子-核子相互作用，包括具有强高动量关联的模型。引入了变分能量的表达式作为损失函数的一部分，该表达式可在PINNs框架内高效计算。同时提供了坐标空间的额外基准测试。
AI.result: 成功获得了氘核的高度精确结果，预测的结合能与数值基准值之间的相对误差约为10^-6量级，与已验证的数值方法结果高度一致。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为利用PINNs解决更复杂原子核问题铺平了道路，证明了PINNs在核物理本征态提取中的有效性和高精度。

title: When Blinking Helps: Suppressed Biexciton Emission in Lead Halide Perovskite Quantum Dots
summary: Blinking and multiphoton emission in metal halide perovskite quantum dots (PQDs) limit their use as single-photon quantum emitters. Conventional models distinguish between trion-related A-type blinking and defect-assisted BC-type blinking, both expected to degrade single-photon purity in a dark state. Here, time-resolved spectroscopy on individual PQDs reveals a qualitatively different regime in which low emitting dark states exhibit higher single-photon purity than bright states. For those PQDs state-resolved $g^{(2)}(τ)$ analysis shows that the exciton photoluminescence quantum yield decreases by a factor of $\sim 8$, while the biexciton one is suppressed by a factor of $\sim 10$. This leads to a moderate improvement of single-photon purity with $g^{(2)}_0$ decreased from 0.155 to 0.120. In contrast, PQDs with fluorescence lifetime--intensity distribution patterns characteristic for A-type blinking, display the expected increase of $g^{(2)}_0$ in charged, trion-dominated states. To explain the observed improvement of single-photon purity of low-emitting dark states, we propose a self-trapped-exciton (STE) mechanism that selectively blocks biexciton formation by diverting hot excitons into long-lived, weakly emissive STE configurations. This STE-mediated blinking channel explains why certain low-emitting states improve, rather than degrade, single-photon purity and suggests a lattice-driven route to perovskite quantum emitters with intrinsically suppressed multiphoton events.

AI.tldr: 钙钛矿量子点中暗态的单光子纯度反而比亮态更高，这与传统闪烁模型相反，提出了自陷激子机制来解释这一现象。
AI.motivation: 金属卤化物钙钛矿量子点作为单光子量子发射器受到闪烁和多光子发射的限制。传统模型认为暗态会降低单光子纯度，但本文发现存在相反的情况。
AI.method: 使用时间分辨光谱技术对单个钙钛矿量子点进行研究，进行状态分辨的g(2)(τ)分析，比较亮态和暗态的单光子纯度。
AI.result: 某些钙钛矿量子点的暗态表现出比亮态更高的单光子纯度，激子光致发光量子产率降低约8倍，双激子被抑制约10倍，g(2)0从0.155降至0.120。
AI.conclusion: 提出了自陷激子机制来解释暗态单光子纯度的改善，这为开发具有本征抑制多光子事件的钙钛矿量子发射器提供了新途径。

title: A Hardware-Native Realisation of Semi-Empirical Electronic Structure Theory on Field-Programmable Gate Arrays
summary: High-throughput quantum-chemical calculations underpin modern molecular modelling, materials discovery, and machine-learning workflows, yet even semi-empirical methods become restrictive when many molecules must be evaluated. Here we report the first hardware-native realisation of semi-empirical electronic structure theory on a field-programmable gate array (FPGA), implementing as a proof of principle Extended Hückel Theory (EHT) and non-self-consistent Density Functional Tight Binding (DFTB0). Our design performs Hamiltonian construction and diagonalisation on the FPGA device through a streaming dataflow, enabling deterministic execution without host intervention. On a mid-range Artix-7 FPGA, the DFTB0 Hamiltonian generator delivers a throughput over fourfold higher than that of a contemporary server-class CPU. Improvements in eigensolver design, memory capacity, and extensions to nuclear gradients and excited states could further expand capability. Combined with the inherent energy efficiency of FPGA dataflow, this work opens a pathway towards sustainable, hardware-native acceleration of electronic-structure simulation and direct hardware implementations of a broad class of methods.

AI.tldr: 在FPGA上首次实现半经验电子结构理论硬件原生计算，包括扩展休克尔理论和DFTB0方法，实现比服务器级CPU高4倍以上的吞吐量。
AI.motivation: 高通量量子化学计算是现代分子建模、材料发现和机器学习工作流的基础，但即使是半经验方法在需要评估大量分子时也变得计算昂贵。需要更高效的硬件原生实现来加速计算。
AI.method: 在FPGA上实现半经验电子结构理论，包括扩展休克尔理论(EHT)和非自洽密度泛函紧束缚(DFTB0)。采用流式数据流设计，在FPGA设备上执行哈密顿量构建和对角化，无需主机干预。
AI.result: 在中端Artix-7 FPGA上，DFTB0哈密顿量生成器的吞吐量比当代服务器级CPU高4倍以上。FPGA数据流的固有能效优势为电子结构模拟提供了可持续的硬件加速途径。
AI.conclusion: 这项工作为电子结构模拟的可持续硬件原生加速开辟了新途径，可扩展到核梯度、激发态等更复杂计算，并为广泛类别的量子化学方法提供直接硬件实现的可能性。

title: Ultra-Fast 3D Porous Media Generation: a GPU- Accelerated List-Indexed Explicit Time-Stepping QSGS Algorithm
summary: Efficient generation of high-resolution synthetic microstructures is essential in digital rock physics, yet classical Quartet Structure Generation Set (QSGS) algorithms become prohibitively expensive on large three-dimensional grids. We develop a list-indexed explicit time-stepping (LIETS) formulation of QSGS that restricts stochastic growth operations to an explicit active front instead of the entire voxel grid. The method is implemented in Python using NumPy on CPUs and CuPy on GPUs, and incorporates seed-spacing control via diamond dilation together with a volume-fraction-dependent directional growth probability. For a 400^3 domain, LIETS reduces generation time from tens of minutes for a serial CPU implementation and several minutes for vectorized CPU and GPU QSGS to about 24 s on a consumer-grade RTX 4060, achieving peak throughputs up to 2.7x10^7 nodes/s. A Fontainebleau sandstone benchmark at 500^3 resolution shows that LIETS reproduces the dependence of pore and grain size distributions on seed spacing (optimal s=30 voxels) and yields permeability-porosity trends within the experimental envelope and consistent with previously published Fast-QSGS results.

AI.tldr: LIETS方法显著加速了三维高分辨率微结构生成，将400^3网格生成时间从数分钟降至24秒，同时保持地质统计特性。
AI.motivation: 传统QSGS算法在处理大型三维网格时计算成本过高，需要开发更高效的微结构生成方法用于数字岩石物理研究。
AI.method: 提出列表索引显式时间步进(LIETS)方法，将随机生长操作限制在显式活动前沿而非整个体素网格，结合种子间距控制和体积分数相关的方向生长概率。
AI.result: 在RTX 4060上，400^3网格生成时间从数分钟降至24秒，峰值吞吐量达2.7×10^7节点/秒；500^3砂岩基准测试显示能准确再现孔隙和颗粒尺寸分布。
AI.conclusion: LIETS方法在保持地质统计特性的同时，显著提高了三维微结构生成效率，为数字岩石物理研究提供了实用的高性能工具。

title: Gaussian Expansion Method for few-body states in two-dimensional materials
comment: 16 pages, 7 figures, Supplementary material (6 pages) included
summary: We investigate the properties of trions in transition metal dichalcogenides (TMDCs) monolayers using the Gaussian Expansion Method (GEM) adapted to two-dimensional systems. Excitons and trions in monolayer TMDCs with the chemical composition MX$_2$ in the 2H phase are studied systematically. We computed the associated exciton and trion binding energies. We find in addition to the known $J = 0$ trion the existence of a bound state with orbital angular momentum $J = 1$. The results for $J = 0$ are benchmarked against existing calculations from the Stochastic Variational Method (SVM) and Quantum Monte Carlo (QMC). Furthermore, we analyze the trion internal structure and geometry through their probability density distributions, accounting for the effects of different material shows that GEM -- widely used in studies of strongly interacting few-body systems -- is well adapted to allow comprehensive and computationally efficient investigations of trions and potentially other weakly bound few-body states in layered materials. In addition, we systematically exploit the effect of strain and dieletric environment in the $J = 1$ trion predictions, illustrated for the MoS$_2$ monolayer example.

AI.tldr: 使用高斯展开法研究二维过渡金属硫族化合物单层中的三粒子态，发现除了已知的J=0三粒子外，还存在轨道角动量J=1的束缚态，并分析了应变和介电环境的影响。
AI.motivation: 研究过渡金属硫族化合物单层中三粒子态的性质，特别是探索是否存在新的束缚态，并理解应变和介电环境对这些量子态的影响。
AI.method: 采用高斯展开法，这是一种常用于强相互作用少体系统研究的方法，将其适应于二维系统，用于计算激子和三粒子的结合能，并与随机变分法和量子蒙特卡洛方法进行基准比较。
AI.result: 除了已知的J=0三粒子外，首次发现了轨道角动量J=1的束缚态；通过概率密度分布分析了三粒子的内部结构和几何形状；以MoS₂单层为例，系统研究了应变和介电环境对J=1三粒子的影响。
AI.conclusion: 高斯展开法适用于层状材料中三粒子和其他弱束缚少体态的全面且计算高效的研究，为理解二维材料中的复杂量子态提供了有力工具。

title: Intermediate Thermal Equilibrium Stages in Molecular Dynamics Simulations of two Bodies in Contact
summary: The Zeroth Law of Thermodynamics states that if two systems are in thermal equilibrium with a third one, then they are also in equilibrium with each other. This study explores not only the final state of thermal equilibrium between ideal gases separated by heat-conducting walls, but also the intermediate stages leading up to equilibrium, using classical molecular dynamics simulations. Two- and three-region models with argon atoms are analyzed. Fluctuations, correlations, and temperature distributions are observed, highlighting how heat conduction between regions influences the time to reach equilibrium. This work is distinguished by its detailed analysis of the intermediate stages that occur until the system reaches thermal equilibrium, in accordance with the Zeroth Law of Thermodynamics.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过分子动力学模拟分析理想气体在热传导过程中的中间阶段，验证热力学第零定律，关注系统达到热平衡前的动态过程。
AI.motivation: 虽然热力学第零定律描述了热平衡的最终状态，但系统达到平衡的中间过程研究不足。本研究旨在详细分析热传导过程中系统达到热平衡前的动态阶段，填补这一研究空白。
AI.method: 使用经典分子动力学模拟，分析包含氩原子的两区域和三区域模型。研究观察温度分布、涨落和相关性，特别关注热传导如何影响系统达到平衡的时间。
AI.result: 模拟揭示了热传导过程中温度分布的演化，观察到涨落和相关性现象，明确了热传导速率对系统达到热平衡时间的影响，验证了热力学第零定律在动态过程中的表现。
AI.conclusion: 该研究不仅验证了热力学第零定律的最终平衡状态，更重要的是详细揭示了系统达到热平衡前的中间动态过程，为理解热传导和热平衡的微观机制提供了新见解。

title: Harmonic-to-anharmonic thermodynamic integration made simple using REG TI
summary: Standard harmonic-to-anharmonic thermodynamic integration (TI) is known to develop a near singularity in the integrand for solids exhibiting diffusive degrees of freedom, such as rotating functional groups or migrating defects. This pathology results in numerical challenges for estimating absolute free energies within a single thermodynamic cycle. In this work, we introduce a simple regularization that removes this singularity and yields a well-behaved integrand that can be accurately evaluated on a uniform grid. The approach -- termed Regularized End-point Gradient (REG) TI -- is demonstrated on a model system and on predicting the relative stability of paracetamol polymorphs for which quasi-free methyl rotations lead to a near singularity in standard TI. We expect REG TI to simplify anharmonic free energy calculations for solids and to potentially enable their automation.

AI.tldr: 提出REG TI方法，通过正则化消除标准热力学积分在固体扩散自由度系统中的奇异性问题
AI.motivation: 标准谐波-非谐波热力学积分在处理具有扩散自由度（如旋转官能团或迁移缺陷）的固体时，会出现近奇异性的数值问题，导致自由能计算困难
AI.method: 提出正则化端点梯度（REG）热力学积分方法，通过简单的正则化消除奇异性，得到在均匀网格上可准确评估的良好行为被积函数
AI.result: 在模型系统和扑热息痛多晶型相对稳定性预测中验证了REG TI的有效性，解决了甲基旋转导致的近奇异性问题
AI.conclusion: REG TI方法简化了固体非谐波自由能计算，有望实现这类计算的自动化

title: Optical gain in colloidal quantum dots is limited by biexciton absorption, not biexciton recombination
summary: Despite three decades of experimental study, optical gain in colloidal quantum dots still lacks a microscopic theory capable of explaining gain thresholds approaching one exciton per dot, their size dependence, or the anomalously small effective stimulated-emission cross sections observed across materials. Existing descriptions treat quantum dots as effective two-level systems comprised of an exciton and a biexciton, attributing gain thresholds to biexciton Auger recombination. This assumption is inconsistent with state-resolved optical pumping experiments and basic spectroscopic constraints. Here we present a microscopic theory of optical gain explicitly anchored in the Einstein relations governing absorption and stimulated emission. Within this framework, gain is determined by a spectral balance between stimulated emission from single excitons and excited-state absorption into biexcitonic manifolds, rather than by biexciton lifetimes. Using a spin-boson description of excitons coupled to a lattice bath, we show that gain thresholds and effective gain cross sections are controlled by the interplay of biexciton stabilization and exciton-lattice dressing. The theory unifies disparate materials by quantitatively explaining all longstanding gain phenomenology in CdSe quantum dots and predicts a continuous crossover to effective four-level, near-thresholdless gain in dynamically disordered lattices such as perovskite quantum dots.

AI.tldr: 提出基于爱因斯坦关系的微观理论解释胶体量子点光学增益，挑战传统双激子模型，揭示增益阈值由单激子受激发射与双激子激发态吸收的谱平衡决定。
AI.motivation: 传统理论将量子点视为由激子和双激子组成的有效二能级系统，用双激子俄歇复合解释增益阈值，但这与态分辨光学泵浦实验和基本光谱约束不一致。需要建立微观理论解释接近每个量子点一个激子的低增益阈值、尺寸依赖性以及跨材料的异常小有效受激发射截面。
AI.method: 提出基于爱因斯坦关系的微观理论框架，将增益视为单激子受激发射与双激子激发态吸收之间的谱平衡。采用激子耦合晶格浴的自旋玻色子描述，分析双激子稳定化和激子-晶格修饰的相互作用。
AI.result: 理论定量解释了CdSe量子点中长期存在的增益现象，包括增益阈值、尺寸依赖性和有效增益截面。预测在动态无序晶格（如钙钛矿量子点）中会连续过渡到有效四能级、近无阈值增益。
AI.conclusion: 光学增益由单激子受激发射与双激子激发态吸收的谱平衡决定，而非双激子寿命。双激子稳定化和激子-晶格修饰的相互作用控制增益阈值和有效增益截面，统一解释了不同材料的增益现象。
